text.section: An officer or official who in any way knowingly permits or participates in making a loan in violation of § 6-611 of this title is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $3,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or both, per occurrence.

If a loan is made in violation of § 6-611 of this title, the credit union may recover the amount of the loan from:
Any borrower; or
Any officer or official who knowingly permitted or participated in making the loan.
